system:
note description: "The interface for an input COMMAND" author: "" date: "$Date$" revision: "$Revision$"
deferred class ../tracker/etf_command.xmlETF_COMMAND
inherit FalseETF_COMMAND_INTERFACE redefine ../tracker/etf_command.xml#f_makemake end
feature {NONE}
f_make../tracker/etf_command.xml#f_makemake (an_etf_cmd_name: FalseSTRING_8; etf_cmd_args: FalseTUPLE; an_etf_cmd_container: FalseETF_ABSTRACT_UI_INTERFACE) local model_access: ../tracker/tracker_access.xmlTRACKER_ACCESS do file#f_featurePrecursor (an_etf_cmd_name, etf_cmd_args, an_etf_cmd_container) ../tracker/etf_command.xml#f_modelmodel := model_access.../tracker/tracker_access.xml#f_mM end
feature -- Attributes -- may declare your own model state here
f_model../tracker/etf_command.xml#f_modelmodel: ../tracker/tracker.xmlTRACKER
f_msg../tracker/etf_command.xml#f_msgmsg: ../tracker/messages_access.xmlMESSAGES_ACCESS
f_error_flag../tracker/etf_command.xml#f_error_flagerror_flag: FalseBOOLEAN
end -- class ../tracker/etf_command.xmlETF_COMMAND
